attributes.action: Make it Illegal to flatly refuse entry for Service personnel into drinking establishments (pubs and clubs)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I recently were refused entry to bar in Bristol purely because I am a serviceman. Surely this is not right, I accept that there maybe some unruly types equally in all walks of life, but to positively discriminate Servicemen is completely wrong
